mapper.update:
update temp_patent
PATENT_NAME = #{patentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLAIMS_QUANTITY = #{claimsQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INDEPENDENT_CLAIMS_QUANTITY = #{independentClaimsQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PDF_FULL_TEXT_QUANTITY = #{pdfFullTextQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_NUMBER = #{appNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_DATE = #{appDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PUB_DATE = #{pubDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIRST_PUB_DATE = #{firstPubDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COUNTRY = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PATENT_TYPE = #{patentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRANT_DATE = #{grantDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPIRE_DATE = #{expireDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIRST_PRIORITY_DATE = #{firstPriorityDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IAPP = #{iapp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IPUB = #{ipub,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEN = #{den,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLICATION = #{application,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLICATION_AREA = #{applicationArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLICATION_ADDRESS = #{applicationAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLICATION_TYPE = #{applicationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLICATION_QUANTITY = #{applicationQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PATENTEE = #{patentee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PATENTEE_AREA = #{patenteeArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PATENTEE_ADDRESS = #{patenteeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PATENTEE_TYPE = #{patenteeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PATENTEE_QUANTITY = #{patenteeQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVENTOR = #{inventor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVENTORS = #{inventors,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CENSOR = #{censor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_NAME = #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENCY_NAME = #{agencyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IPC = #{ipc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAIN_IPC = #{mainIpc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IPC_QUANTITY = #{ipcQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CPC = #{cpc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAIN_CPC = #{mainCpc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CPC_QUANTITY = #{cpcQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESIGN_CLASS = #{designClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGAL_STATUS = #{legalStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_GRANT = #{isGrant,jdbcType=BIT},
PKPU_STATUS = #{pkpuStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SURVIVAL_PERIOD = #{survivalPeriod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPECTED_RESIDUAL_LIFE = #{expectedResidualLife,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANSFER_STATUS = #{transferStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LICENSE_STATUS = #{licenseStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLEDGE_STATUS = #{pledgeStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REEXAM_INVALID_STATUS = #{reexamInvalidStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAWSUIT_STATUS = #{lawsuitStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BASIC_PATENT_FAMILY = #{basicPatentFamily,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BASIC_PATENT_FAMILY_QUANTITY = #{basicPatentFamilyQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXTENDED_PATENT_FAMILY = #{extendedPatentFamily,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXTENDED_PATENT_FAMILY_QUANTITY = #{extendedPatentFamilyQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PATENT_CITATION = #{patentCitation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PATENT_CITATION_QUANTITY = #{patentCitationQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PATENT_CITED = #{patentCited,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PATENT_CITED_QUANTITY = #{patentCitedQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OVERALL_MERIT = #{overallMerit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TECHNICAL_INDEX = #{technicalIndex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLAIMS_INDEX = #{claimsIndex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARKET_INDEX = #{marketIndex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update temp_patent set PATENT_NAME = #{patentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLAIMS_QUANTITY = #{claimsQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INDEPENDENT_CLAIMS_QUANTITY = #{independentClaimsQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PDF_FULL_TEXT_QUANTITY = #{pdfFullTextQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_NUMBER = #{appNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_DATE = #{appDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PUB_DATE = #{pubDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PATENT_CITATION = #{patentCitation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PATENT_CITATION_QUANTITY = #{patentCitationQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PATENT_CITED = #{patentCited,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PATENT_CITED_QUANTITY = MARKET_INDEX = #{marketIndex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATEDBY = #{updatedby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE temp_patent SET IS_DELETED = 'Y' WHERE ID IN
#{patentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select tp.ID, tp.PATENT_NAME, tp.CLAIMS_QUANTITY, tp.INDEPENDENT_CLAIMS_QUANTITY, tp.PDF_FULL_TEXT_QUANTITY, tp.APP_NUMBER, tp.APP_DATE, tp.PUB_DATE, tp.FIRST_PUB_DATE, tp.COUNTRY, tp.PATENT_TYPE, tp.GRANT_DATE, tp.EXPIRE_DATE, tp.PRIORITY, tp.FIRST_PRIORITY_DATE, tp.IAPP, tp.IPUB, tp.DEN, tp.APPLICATION, tp.APPLICATION_AREA, tp.APPLICATION_ADDRESS, tp.APPLICATION_TYPE, tp.APPLICATION_QUANTITY, tp.PATENTEE, tp.PATENTEE_AREA, tp.PATENTEE_ADDRESS, tp.PATENTEE_TYPE, tp.PATENTEE_QUANTITY, tp.INVENTOR, tp.INVENTORS, tp.CENSOR, AGENT_NAME, tp.AGENCY_NAME, tp.IPC, tp.MAIN_IPC, tp.IPC_QUANTITY, tp.CPC, tp.MAIN_CPC, tp.CPC_QUANTITY, tp.DESIGN_CLASS, tp.LEGAL_STATUS, tp.IS_GRANT, tp.PKPU_STATUS, tp.SURVIVAL_PERIOD, tp.EXPECTED_RESIDUAL_LIFE, tp.TRANSFER_STATUS, tp.LICENSE_STATUS, tp.PLEDGE_STATUS, tp.REEXAM_INVALID_STATUS, tp.LAWSUIT_STATUS, tp.BASIC_PATENT_FAMILY, tp.BASIC_PATENT_FAMILY_QUANTITY, tp.EXTENDED_PATENT_FAMILY, tp.EXTENDED_PATENT_FAMILY_QUANTITY, tp.PATENT_CITATION, tp.PATENT_CITATION_QUANTITY, tp.PATENT_CITED, tp.PATENT_CITED_QUANTITY, tp.OVERALL_MERIT, tp.TECHNICAL_INDEX, tp.CLAIMS_INDEX, tp.MARKET_INDEX, rtp.CHAPTER_ID from hcrp_report_patent as rtp left join temp_patent as tp ON tp.ID = rtp.PATENT_ID where rtp.REPORT_ID = #{_reportId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select tp.ID, tp.PATENT_NAME, tp.CLAIMS_QUANTITY, tp.INDEPENDENT_CLAIMS_QUANTITY, tp.PDF_FULL_TEXT_QUANTITY, tp.APP_NUMBER, tp.APP_DATE, tp.PUB_DATE, tp.FIRST_PUB_DATE, tp.COUNTRY, tp.PATENT_TYPE, tp.GRANT_DATE, tp.EXPIRE_DATE, tp.PRIORITY, tp.FIRST_PRIORITY_DATE, tp.IAPP, tp.IPUB, tp.DEN, tp.APPLICATION, tp.APPLICATION_AREA, tp.APPLICATION_ADDRESS, tp.APPLICATION_TYPE, tp.APPLICATION_QUANTITY, tp.PATENTEE, tp.PATENTEE_AREA, tp.PATENTEE_ADDRESS, tp.PATENTEE_TYPE, tp.PATENTEE_QUANTITY, tp.INVENTOR, tp.INVENTORS, tp.CENSOR, AGENT_NAME, tp.AGENCY_NAME, tp.IPC, tp.MAIN_IPC, tp.IPC_QUANTITY, tp.CPC, tp.MAIN_CPC, tp.CPC_QUANTITY, tp.DESIGN_CLASS, tp.LEGAL_STATUS, tp.IS_GRANT, tp.PKPU_STATUS, tp.SURVIVAL_PERIOD, tp.EXPECTED_RESIDUAL_LIFE, tp.TRANSFER_STATUS, tp.LICENSE_STATUS, tp.PLEDGE_STATUS, tp.REEXAM_INVALID_STATUS, tp.LAWSUIT_STATUS, tp.BASIC_PATENT_FAMILY, tp.BASIC_PATENT_FAMILY_QUANTITY, tp.EXTENDED_PATENT_FAMILY, tp.EXTENDED_PATENT_FAMILY_QUANTITY, tp.PATENT_CITATION, tp.PATENT_CITATION_QUANTITY, tp.PATENT_CITED, tp.PATENT_CITED_QUANTITY, tp.OVERALL_MERIT, tp.TECHNICAL_INDEX, tp.CLAIMS_INDEX, tp.MARKET_INDEX, rtp.CHAPTER_ID from hcrp_report_patent as rtp left join temp_patent as tp ON tp.ID = rtp.PATENT_ID where rtp.CHAPTER_ID = #{_chapterId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from temp_patent T where IS_DELETED='N'
order by t.update_time desc,t.create_time desc,t.id
